mapper.select: SELECT spacesNo ,userNo ,spaceName ,spaceSummary ,spaceInfo ,email ,phone ,tel ,spaceLink ,postCode ,address ,addressDetail ,instDtm ,updtDtm ,roomInfo FROM spaces ORDER BY spacesNo

SELECT spacesNo, userNo, spaceName, spaceSummary, spaceInfo, email, phone, tel, spaceLink, postCode, address, addressDetail, instDtm, updtDtm FROM spaces ORDER BY spacesNo LIMIT #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}
